title: Sri Lanka seeks US $ 1.5 Bn assistance from China, says Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has requested financial assistance of US $ 1.5 Bn from China.
This was confirmed by the Chinese Ambassador to Sri Lanka on Monday (21) morning.
